holidays.title: Mountain Day
holidays.description: Ain't no mountain high enough to keep people from celebrating Mountain Day in Japan.

holidays.title: National Son and Daughter Day
holidays.description: National Son and Daughter Day is a time to go ahead and spoil the kids a little.

holidays.title: Chad Independence Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate Chad which gained independence after being colonized for 60 years.

holidays.title: Hip Hop Day
holidays.description: Amp up your music player, and dedicate a playlist for hip-hop on this special day!

holidays.title: Ingersoll Day
holidays.description: See how we plan to remember and honor this great man.

holidays.title: National Align Your Teeth Day
holidays.description: Join us as we raise awareness about the importance of teeth alignment.

holidays.title: National Bakewell Tart Day
holidays.description: Take a bite out of the decadent layers of Bakewell tart this National Bakewell Tart Day!

holidays.title: National Face Mask Day
holidays.description: Whip up a homemade face mask and let it work its magic on your skin!

holidays.title: National Fufu Day
holidays.description: Enjoy the West African dish, Fufu — dipped in sauces or paired with stews.

holidays.title: National Presidential Joke Day
holidays.description: Presidents can be funny people too; let’s share some of their best jokes.

holidays.title: National Raspberry Bombe Day
holidays.description: Get ready for another deliciously sweet celebration this National Raspberry Bombe Day.

holidays.title: Shop Online for Groceries Day
holidays.description: Don’t move an inch, you are one click away from a checked-out grocery list!

holidays.title: Alyson Stoner’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented artist has it all! Celebrate her special day with us today!

holidays.title: Changbin’s Birthday
holidays.description: All it took was an exceptional performance at a school festival for him to realize his dream!

holidays.title: Chris Hemsworth’s Birthday
holidays.description: From humble beginnings as a television series actor to one of the best Marvel characters!

holidays.title: Hulk Hogan’s Birthday
holidays.description: What started as a music career turned into a professional wrestling career!

holidays.title: Joe Rogan’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Joe Rogan, the sky’s the limit. Celebrate his special day with us right here!

holidays.title: Savannah Chrisley’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this beautiful reality star, there's no time to stroll when success keeps calling her name.
